Real_World_Examples: Northern France farmlands, North China Plain
Vibes: Intensively farmed fields, orchards, irrigation, villages everywhere.

Real_World_Examples: Medieval European countryside, New England mixed farms
Vibes: Patchwork of fields, hedgerows, and woodlots with scattered villages.

Real_World_Examples: Central Asian grazing lands, drier parts of Great Plains
Vibes: Semi-wild grazing country with herders, fences, and long stock trails.

Real_World_Examples: Rome at its height, Angkor temple complex
Vibes: Dense stone, streets, walls, or sprawling ruins dominating the hex.

Real_World_Examples: Amazon, Congo Basin, Borneo lowlands
Vibes: Steaming multi-layer jungle; very slow travel, huge biodiversity.

Real_World_Examples: Indian monsoon deciduous forests, parts of Central America
Vibes: Dense broadleaf forest that drops leaves in the long dry season; dusty, then explosively lush in the rains.

Real_World_Examples: Mexican pine–oak forests, Central American highland conifers
Vibes: Warm highland forests of pines and oaks; clear understory, good trails, foggy ridges.

Real_World_Examples: Eastern US woods, central European forests
Vibes: Classic four-season forest of oaks and beeches; archetypal fantasy woods.

Real_World_Examples: Pacific Northwest, coastal redwoods
Vibes: Giant conifers, mist, mossy trunks, deep ravines and very wet air.

Real_World_Examples: Mid-elevation Rockies, Carpathian pine belts
Vibes: Steep slopes cloaked in conifers and mixed woods; deep valleys and rough trails.

Real_World_Examples: Siberia, interior Canada and Alaska
Vibes: Endless conifers, long snowy winters, boggy hollows and biting insects.

Real_World_Examples: Mediterranean Basin hills, California chaparral, Chilean matorral
Vibes: Hot dry summers, wet winters; oaks, scrub, frequent fires; bandit hills above wine valleys.

Real_World_Examples: Indian monsoon woodlands, African miombo
Vibes: Tall grass with scattered trees, strong wet–dry seasons, big storms.

Real_World_Examples: Serengeti, Brazilian cerrado (open forms)
Vibes: Warm open grassland with scattered trees, herds, predators, frequent fires.

Real_World_Examples: North American prairies, Argentinian pampas
Vibes: Deep, fertile grasses under big skies; fast travel and farming potential.

Real_World_Examples: Central Asian steppe, drier Great Plains
Vibes: Sparser, shorter grass, big temperature swings, nomads and dust storms.

Real_World_Examples: Scottish Highlands, Irish boggy uplands
Vibes: Windy heaths, rough grass, heather and bogs; sheep, stones, and fog.

Real_World_Examples: Alpine meadows in Alps/Rockies, Tibetan alpine pastures
Vibes: High meadows and shrubs above treeline; short summers, herders and sky predators.

Real_World_Examples: American Southwest, Sahel fringe
Vibes: Rocky mesas and canyons, thorn scrub, dry most of the year with violent storms.

Real_World_Examples: Central Sahara, Atacama core, Rub’ al Khali
Vibes: Vast dunes or salt flats with almost no life; survival and navigation are the challenge.

Real_World_Examples: Tibetan Plateau basins, some high Andean deserts
Vibes: Thin air, cold nights, stony ground with sparse shrubs and distant horizons.

Real_World_Examples: Dakotas badlands, Cappadocia, eroded plateaus
Vibes: Labyrinths of gullies, buttes, and cliffs; sparse plants, perfect ambush country.

Real_World_Examples: Klamath Marshes, Okavango grasslands, large river marshes
Vibes: Wide reedbeds and shallow water; boats and causeways instead of roads.

Real_World_Examples: Congo/Amazon swamp forests, parts of the Everglades
Vibes: Trees standing in dark water, buttress roots, humid and buzzing with life.

Real_World_Examples: US Gulf Coast bayous, Danube floodplain woods
Vibes: Moss-draped trees over slow brown channels; rot, ghosts, and hidden shacks.

Real_World_Examples: Sundarbans, Florida mangroves, SE Asian coasts
Vibes: Brackish coastal forests with tangled roots; tides, salt, crocodiles, and smugglers.

Real_World_Examples: Peat bogs of Ireland/Scotland, Canadian muskeg
Vibes: Spongy, peaty ground, dwarf trees, hidden pools, mist and will-o-wisps.

Real_World_Examples: Arctic coastal plains, Alaska North Slope
Vibes: Permafrost plains with dwarf shrubs, thaw ponds, and reindeer or caribou.

Real_World_Examples: High Alps above treeline, Andean puna
Vibes: Above the trees: short grass, rocks and snowfields; thin air and sudden storms.

Real_World_Examples: Greenland ice margins, large alpine glaciers
Vibes: Bare ice and snow with crevasses; almost no forage, high environmental hazard.
